snippet: Asa Hutchinson, a Republican running for governor, said he raised more than $167,000 last month in his bid for Arkansas’ top office.
abstract: Asa Hutchinson, Republican running for governor of Arkansas, says he has raised more than $167,000 in his bid for state’s top office.
lead_paragraph: Asa Hutchinson, a Republican running for governor, said he raised more than $167,000 last month in his bid for Arkansas’ top office.

headline.main: Arkansas: Hutchinson Outraises Rival in G.O.P. Primary for Post of Governor
headline.print_headline: Arkansas: Hutchinson Outraises Rival in G.O.P. Primary for Post of Governor
